summary: Tested BoardHeader component redesign for Unatienda Inventory. All desktop and mobile features verified working. The Monday.com-inspired unified header consolidates title, tabs, search, filters, stats, and actions into a clean card layout. Mobile responsiveness tested at 375px and 768px viewports.
passed_tests: Admin login works at /admin/login with admin@chipi.co / admin
Navigation to Unatienda > Inventory tab works
BoardHeader renders with data-testid='board-header'
Row 1: Title 'Inventory' with Warehouse icon and subtitle visible
Row 1: View mode toggles (Products/Movements) working
Row 1: Refresh button (board-refresh) working
Row 1: Import CSV button visible
Row 1: Add Product button (add-product-btn) visible
Row 2: Tabs (All, Textbooks, Public, Archive) render with correct data-testids (board-tab-all, board-tab-pca, board-tab-public, board-tab-archived)
Row 2: Tab clicking filters table correctly - All shows 32 items, Textbooks shows 15 items
Row 2: Search bar (board-search) filters products by name/code/publisher
Row 2: Filter dropdowns (Grade, Subject, Status) visible on desktop (>= md)
Row 2: Clear filters button (board-clear-filters) appears when filters are active
Row 3: Stats chips display correctly - 32 total, 32 active, 873 stock, 3 low stock, 3 out of stock, 5 grades
Stats chips use appropriate colors (green for stock, amber for low stock, red for out of stock)
Mobile (375px): Filter toggle button (board-filter-toggle) visible and working
Mobile (375px): Mobile filters panel (board-mobile-filters) expands on toggle click
Mobile (375px): Tabs are horizontally scrollable
Mobile (375px): Stats chips visible without internal wrapping
Tablet (768px): Desktop filters visible, filter toggle hidden
View mode toggle switches between Products table and Movements history panel
Table renders correctly with products, sorting headers, and pagination
critical_code_review_comments: BoardHeader component properly exports TabSegment, StatChip, FilterDropdown as internal components
All interactive elements have correct data-testid attributes for testing
Mobile filter toggle uses 'md:hidden' class correctly to show only on mobile
Desktop filters use 'hidden md:flex' for responsive visibility
Stats row uses overflow-x-auto scrollbar-hide for horizontal scrolling on mobile
Tab container uses overflow-x-auto scrollbar-hide for mobile scrollability
Color palette for stats chips is well-defined in STAT_COLORS constant
Component props are well-documented with JSDoc comment at top of file

desktop_1920px.row_1_elements: Title with icon, subtitle, view toggles, refresh, import CSV, Add Product button all visible
